## Is this related to a problem?

A clear description of the problem or limitation you are experiencing.
Example: "I keep losing track of which bets were skipped by the XGB dual-gate and why..."

## Describe the solution you would like

A clear description of the feature or change you want. Include:
- Which part of the stack it affects (Flask/app.py, n8n workflow, Supabase schema, dashboard, ML model)
- What the expected behavior would be after the change

## Alternatives considered

Any alternative approaches or workarounds you have already thought about.

## Additional context

Add any other context, mockups, data examples, or links to relevant research here.
